Helium Mines.name: Helium Mines
Helium Mines.description: You are deep within the Helium-3 mines of Mars, surrounded by oppressive darkness and the hum of mining equipment.

Lykos Colony.name: Lykos Colony
Lykos Colony.description: The colony is bustling with activity. Reds toil endlessly to extract Helium-3 under the watchful eyes of Gold overlords.

Institute.name: Institute
Institute.description: You are at the infamous Institute, where Golds battle to prove their superiority.
